description: '''Rara tech''' is an [[electronic music]] subgenre that fuses the [[Afro-Haitian]] genre [[rara music|rara]] with [[house music]]. Haitian-style [[electronic dance music]] (EDM) in Haiti is often referred to as "HEDM" (Haitian electronic dance music). The origins of the genre and term was pioneered by Haitian artist, music producer, and DJ, [[Gardy Girault]].
